summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4344 for the improvement of North 63rd Street, North 64th Street and North 65th Street, each from Phinney Avenue to Aurora Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 51511, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
